ValidationRule.description: Before this type of Task can be marked Completed, the Candidate Approval must be specified (either approved or rejected).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Candidate_Approval", ISBLANK( TEXT(Approval_Decision__c) ), ISCHANGED( Status ), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Completed") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Approval Decision field must be filled out before marking this task Completed.
